divs: Sighting Detailswhile burning trash in my backyard i looked up and noticed a black object in the sky and i could also hear a jet but couldnt see it.i went into the house to get my binoculars and came back the object was gone.about five minutes later i saw the same black object heading east and a f15 chasing it . this craft had a bat wing shape and much faster than the jet.i only heard one jet sound.i live near a base that has a fighter group stationed there but i have never seen a craft like the black one i saw.i watched until both craft went into a cloud bank.
